item.title: Garlic Pork Belly
item.description: Got some pork belly in your fridge? Easy to make yet delicious crispy pork belly strips. Fresh pork belly strips and cloves of garlic Ingredients 1 kg pork belly (cut into thick strips) 1 head of garlic (cruched, peeled and chooped) 1⁄2 cup vinegar 1⁄2 cup water salt and black pepper to taste Great with some fresh green salads Here’s the video on how to cook this delicious recipe:
